text.text_translated:
Society tells girls to like art. It tells them to leave maths and physics for boys. This idea comes from people, not from nature.
Also, girls do not see good examples of women in science jobs. This is a problem. In cartoons and stories, the scientist is often a man. He is a crazy scientist, a great inventor, or a person who travels to space.
People also have wrong ideas about scientists. The media shows these false ideas. These ideas are called stereotypes. People think scientists are not good with other people. They think scientists work alone. They think their work is separate from the rest of the world.
Because of this, girls do not see people like them doing science. They may think science is not a good job for them.
If girls see more women scientists, it helps them. They will feel more sure of themselves. They will feel that they are part of the world of science.

Society tells us that girls should like art. It tells us boys should like maths and physics. This idea comes from people, not from nature.
Also, girls do not see good examples of women in science jobs. This is a problem. In cartoons and stories, the scientist is often a man. He is a crazy scientist, a great inventor, or an astronaut.
People also have wrong ideas about scientists. The media shows these false ideas. These ideas are called stereotypes. People think scientists are not good with other people. They think scientists work alone.
Because of this, girls may not want to be scientists. They may think science is not an interesting job for them.
If girls see more women scientists, it helps them. They will feel more sure of themselves. They will feel that they are part of the world of science.
